snippet.title: Sins (Animatic) | Farewell Avalon Story Trailer
snippet.description:
"These were the final moments of Archie's human life. Rather than being left to slowly perish in the wastelands, Archgoddess Morgale used whatever strength she had to freeze the mountains— hastening the boy's suffering.
It was cruel, but being the weakest archgod, it was all she could do."
- The Agent

===============+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷===============

You can now download Farewell Avalon yourself. Explore the ruins of the Avalonian People and unravel Archie's past. 

Itch.io:
https://centennial-game-dev.itch.io/farewell-avalon

After playing the demo, have some feedback you want to share?
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScU4NScLRNI8cd9g8nOU66DIyXFvcQPG8r3badF2XKubtxV4g/viewform

===============+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷===============

Join my discord server to be a part of the c̶u̶l̶t̶ community:
https://discord.gg/SEwPxr6M2v
